UserName.claimUserName: Claim a username for your resume
UserName.userNameHint: You can use letters, numbers & underscores '_'.
UserName.userHandleName: This is the user handle name.
UserName.checkYourResume: Click here to copy your private URL.
UserName.editButton: Click on the edit button and select a handle name of your choice.
UserName.pageDescription: ( Choose a handle of your choice )
UserName.privacy: Your resume is confidential by default, it is accessible only to individuals who have received prior approval from you.
UserName.completedResumes: Fully completed resumes can be featured on the homepage to increase visibility.
UserName.successfulCompletion: Upon successful completion of the resume verification process, your resume will be prominently displayed on the homepage.
UserName.publicDescription: Your Resume is public, now any user can view your resume.
UserName.copy: Click here to copy your resume link
UserName.copyPortfolio: Click here to copy your portfolio link

Appbar.title: LeetCV
Appbar.quote: Checkout the resume. Click on the url to visit on the profile.
Appbar.signOutWarningOne: Signing out will prevent you from receiving push notifications on this device.
Appbar.signOutWarningTwo: Signing out will prevent you from notifying you of requests to view your resume.
Appbar.logOutTitle: Are you sure you want to sign out?
Appbar.logOutDescription: Signing out will prevent you from receiving push notifications on this device and notifying you of requests to view your resume.
Appbar.inviteDescription: Share the resume magic - invite your friends to join!
Appbar.referralDescription: You and your colleague will get each 1000 tokens

ResumeEditor.browserNotSupported: Native sharing is not supported in this browser. You can manually copy the link by clicking the copy button and paste it wherever you want.

OpenAIResume.updateResumeDesc: Feel free to enhance your resume by clicking the Update Resume button.
OpenAIResume.loginDesc: To access or download this resume, please log in.

Unsubscribe.unsubscribeMessage: We are sorry to see you go. You are successfully unsubscribed we will not charge you for the next month, You can come back to resubscribe anytime. Please let us know what we can do better
Unsubscribe.YourToken: Your token usage is renewed every
Unsubscribe.cancelledMessage: You have cancelled your subscription. As a result, no further payments will be processed starting next month.

SyncApp.selectSync: Select Sync Now for the latest version available.

Footer.paragraph: Resume of the future. For 20+ years we have been using PDF for resume, it is time to move forward to the new age of mobile responsive, sharable, passcode protected.
Footer.latestNews: The latest news, articles, and resources, sent to your inbox weekly.
Footer.scanQrCode: Scan the QR code to download the app.

Settings.resumePrivacyDescription: A private resume is a confidential document containing your professional qualifications and experiences, typically not shared publicly.
Settings.claimHandleDescription: Modify your username to personalize your online identity. Select a username that mirrors your identity and is easily recognizable by others.
Settings.tokenDescription: Tokens unlock premium features for perfecting your AI-generated resume. Upgrade to LeetCV Premium or Pro Plans for more tokens and additional benefits.
Settings.planUserDescription: Tokens are your key to accessing these premium features. With tokens, you can refine and optimize your AI-generated resume to perfection.
Settings.privateLinkDescription: Create a private, secure link to share your professional resume with specific people or organizations, keeping it confidential and not public.
Settings.syncDescription: Effortlessly sync your LeetCV data across devices and platforms to maintain current professional information for easy career management.
Settings.unsubscribeDescription: Opt-out of our services by unsubscribing. This action will remove your access to LeetCV features. Please be aware that unsubscribing is a permanent decision and cannot be undone.
Settings.addSecondaryEmailDesc: Add a secondary email to ensure continuous account access, especially if your primary email becomes restricted by your institute or college. Once added, you'll receive a recovery code to your email, so keep it safe for future account recovery.
Settings.recoverOldAccountDesc: To recover your old account, enter the recovery code and associated email. Once initiated, your current resume will be replaced with the old account's resume. This action is irreversible.
Settings.pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
Settings.recoveryCode: Recovery code sent on your email!
Settings.resumeCouldNotBeRecovered: Unable to retrieve the resume due to an incorrect recovery code or email.
Settings.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to recover this profile, this process is irreversible, if you proceed further you will lose all your existing data.
Settings.referralCodeDescription: Unlock exclusive benefits with the power of referrals! Share your unique referral code with friends, colleagues, and connections to supercharge your LeetCV experience.
Settings.feedbackDescription: We value your input. Please share your thoughts with us.
Settings.name: Name
Settings.feedbackHeaderdesc: Your voice matters! Share your thoughts, ideas, and experiences to help us enhance and tailor LeetCV to your needs.
Settings.thankYouFeedback: Your feedback has been submitted successfully!

Referral.youAndYourColleague: You and your colleague will get each 1000 tokens
Referral.haveAnyReferralCode: Do you have any referral code?
Referral.professionalResume: Craft your professional resume on LeetCV in just 10 minutes! ðŸš€ Use my referral code
Referral.exclusiveOffer: for an exclusive offer. Let's elevate our careers together!
Referral.invalidLink: Invalid link. Please provide a valid link
Referral.addSecondaryEmailDesc: Add a secondary email to ensure continuous account access, especially if your primary email becomes restricted by your institute or college. Once added, you'll receive a recovery code to your email, so keep it safe for future account recovery.
Referral.recoverOldAccountDesc: To recover your old account, enter the recovery code and associated email. Once initiated, your current resume will be replaced with the old account's resume. This action is irreversible.
